ygData.msgSnippet: Hi Ulf, If you were trying to use the MatchesStatusCodeDecideRule in the scope DecideRuleSequence, it shouldn t work because at that stage, the URL is not yet

Subject: RE: [archive-crawler] Usage of MatchesStatusCodeDecideRule
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=363624086; y=h4GQ8S582yy_uKTmKOaCKaqP0GUPOwvbGlQZAtDSgKnM0Eu6
X-Yahoo-Profile: laurendko
From: "Ko, Lauren" <lauren.ko@...>

Hi Ulf,

If you were trying to use the MatchesStatusCodeDecideRule in the s=
cope DecideRuleSequence, it shouldn't work because at that stage, the URL i=
s not yet fetched, so you won't have a status code to check.

You could mov=
e the rule to the WARCWriterProcessor if you want to write based on the sta=
tus code. It might looks something like this (I didn't test the following b=
lock):

<bean id=3D"warcWriter" class=3D"org.archive.modules.writer.WARCWri=
terProcessor">
       <property name=3D"shouldProcessRule">
         <bean =
class=3D"org.archive.modules.deciderules.DecideRuleSequence">
           <p=
roperty name=3D"rules">
             <list>
               <bean class=3D"o=
rg.archive.modules.deciderules.RejectDecideRule">
               </bean>
  =
             <bean class=3D"org.archive.modules.deciderules.MatchesStatusCo=
deDecideRule">
                 <property name=3D"decision" value=3D"ACCEPT=
" />
                 <property name=3D"lowerBound" value=3D"200" />
      =
           <property name=3D"upperBound" value=3D"299" />
               </=
bean>
             </list>
           </property>
         </bean>
       <=
/property>
...

Lauren Ko
Programmer
UNT Libraries
________________________=
________________
From: archive-crawler@yahoogroups.com [archive-crawler@yah=
oogroups.com]
Sent: Wednesday, January 21, 2015 2:41 AM
To: archive-crawler=

Subject: [archive-crawler] Usage of Ma=
tchesStatusCodeDecideRule

Hi,

Could I use bean "MatchesStatusCodeDecideRu=
le", to select only successfully pages (status 200 - 299)  to the warc-fil,=
 or what is the purpose of this bean?

I am using Heritrix 3.2.0,
I have fo=
llowing code in my crawler-beans.cxml file

<bean id=3D"scope" class=3D"org=
.archive.modules.deciderules.DecideRuleSequence">
...
   <bean class=3D"org=
.archive.modules.deciderules.MatchesStatusCodeDecideRule">
      <property =
name=3D"decision" value=3D"ACCEPT" />
      <property name=3D"lowerBound" v=
alue=3D"200" />
      <property name=3D"upperBound" value=3D"299" />
   </b=
ean>

</bean>

In heritrix_out.log,  the DecideRule of MatchesStatusCodeDec=
ideRule only returns "NONE" for every pages.

Best regards
Ulf
